thread.title: McCarthy’s withdrawal leaves House Republicans in disarray
thread.title_full: McCarthy’s withdrawal leaves House Republicans in disarray - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Carolyn Lochhead
title: McCarthy’s withdrawal leaves House Republicans in disarray
text:
Photo: Chip Somodevilla House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy and his wife, Judy, walk out of the caucus room after he announced that he will not be a candidate for Speaker of the House. House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy and his wife, Judy, walk out...
WASHINGTON — Rep. Kevin McCarthy left his party flummoxed about where to turn next for a leader, and the rest of Washington stunned by the chaos within Congress’ ruling party, when he removed himself from the running Thursday for House speaker. House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy and his wife, Judy, walk out of the caucus room after he announced that he will not be a candidate for Speaker of the House. House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy and his wife, Judy, walk out...
WASHINGTON — Rep. Kevin McCarthy left his party flummoxed about where to turn next for a leader, and the rest of Washington stunned by the chaos within Congress’ ruling party, when he removed himself from the running Thursday for House speaker.
